frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Raleigh co-located with All Things Open 2023
frontmatter.venue_address: 200 E. Martin Street, Suite A, Raleigh, NC 27601
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is October 18 in Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Raleigh, NC. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions. This Gathering will focus on Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include Aritifical Intelligence, hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and Open Source thought leadership.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Reception is Open to all registered attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
OpenShift Demos: Computer Vision and Reinforcement Learning
Forging the Future: One Platform to Rule Them All
Building a Developer Platform with OpenShift
Will Open Source software continue to dominate in the age of AI?
Lightspeed and the Evolution of Artificial Intelligence
AI at Red Hat: What's Next
AI Partner Panel with Dell, IBM and Neural Magic
AMA with Red Hat Engineers, Product Managers, Project Leads and Guest Speakers
